data.title: Big Tech wants AI to help with your holiday shopping. The tech has flashes of magic, but it won’t replace Santa—yet | Fortune
data.description: A flurry of new AI shopping assistants from OpenAI, Google, Perplexity, Amazon, Walmart, and Target promise to simplify gift-buying—but there are still glitches, gaps, and plenty of holiday-season caveats.
data.author: Sharon Goldman
